trustfund:
TF023339-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT
            FOR ALBANIA FROM NORWAY,TF023249-ALBANIA STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT
            CREDIT - SWISS GRANT,TF036256-ALBANIA - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT,TF023516-MULTI-DONOR GRANT FOR THE
            ALBANIA PUBLIC EXPENDITURE TRACKING SURVEYS

abstracts.cdata!:
The Structural Adjustment Credit (SAC)
            Project seeks to back the government's efforts toward
            the restoration of sustained growth and improved living
            standards through reforms that enhance government
            functioning and also strengthen the environment for more
            efficient private sector development. Governance and
            institutional reform will be the backbone of the reform
            program. The project will aid fiscal adjustment and ensure
            the sustainability of the reform process by strengthening
            the institutional infrastructure needed to improve the
            public sector's capacity to carry out its role
            effectively and efficiently. It will also encourage private
            sector development and improve the efficiency and
            functioning of the banking system. By reducing public sector
            recourse to the banking system, the SAC will allow more
            resources for private sector investment. The project will
            also provide a positive signal to international institutions
            and investors regarding the government's commitment to
            reform. The project risks include: 1) excessive pressure on
            economy and macroeconomic stability as a result of continued
            influx of refugees into Albania; 2) high inflation as a
            result of macroeconomic instability; 3) potential civil
            disorders because of political instability; and 4) program
            implementation delay because of poor coordination among ministries.
